alert.note: Alert for Labette; Neosho (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 12:54AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Labette and Neosho Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 1253 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Buffalo to near Dearing to 7 miles east of Ochelata. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Parsons, Chanute, Oswego, Erie, Chetopa, Altamont, St. Paul, Thayer, Edna, Mound Valley, Walnut, Galesburg, Bartlett, Labette, Stark, Earlton, Parsons Tri City Airport, Lake Parsons, Angola and Dennis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for southeastern Kansas.
